sourcesContent:
export const questionObj = {"Qtext": "
Consider the below figure. It is given that LMN and NPQ are two triangles where ML is parallel to NP . Also, \(LQ : LN = 2 : 5 \). Now, 
itemize{}
\item Prove that \(\Delta LOQ \sim \Delta NPQ \)
\item Find LO if \(NP = 6 \)
\item If OQ is parallel to MN , find ratio of areas of triangles LOQ and LMN .
tikzpicture{}
\newline

", "Steps": [{"id": "s1", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "
Considering triangles LOQ and NPQ , we have
\[
	\angle LQO = \angle NQP
\]
\[
	\angle OLQ = \angle PNQ 
\]"}, {"id": "s2", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "
So, we can write
\[
	\Delta LOQ \sim \Delta NPQ 
\]"}, {"id": "s3", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "
It is given that
\[
	\frac{LQ }{LN } = \frac{2 }{5 }
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow 5 LQ = 2 (LQ + QN )
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow 3 LQ = 2 QN 
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{LQ }{QN } = \frac{2 }{3 }
\]"}, {"id": "s4", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "$$\text{
As we already proved that $\Delta LOQ \sim \Delta NPQ $,}$$ 
\[
	\frac{LO }{NP } = \frac{LQ }{QN }
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{LO }{6 } = \frac{2 }{3 }
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow LO = 4.0 
\]"}, {"id": "s5", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "
It is given that OQ is parallel to MN , so
\[
	\angle LOQ = \angle LMN 
\]
In triangles LOQ and LMN , we got 
\[
	\angle L = \angle L 
\]"}, {"id": "s6", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "
So, we can write that
\[
	\Delta LOQ \sim \Delta LMN 
\]"}, {"id": "s7", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "
So, we can write
\[
	\frac{\textrm{area of }\Delta LOQ }{\textrm{area of } \Delta LMN } = \frac{LQ ^2}{LN ^2}
\]
\[
	= \frac{4 }{25 }
\]
\newline

"}]} 

 export const resp = [{"data": [], "text": "$$\text{$\angle LQO = \angle NQP${Vertically opposite angles}, and $\angle OLQ = \angle PNQ ${alternate interior angles}. "}, {"data": [], "text": " "}, {"data": [], "text": "$$\text{Upon further simplification of $\frac{LQ }{LN } = \frac{2 }{5 }$, we get $\frac{LQ }{QN } \frac{2 }{3 }$"}, {"data": [], "text": "$$\text{Since, $$\Delta LOQ \sim \Delta NPQ $, therefore, $\frac{LO }{NP } = \frac{LQ }{QN }$, and hence, $LO = 4.0 $.}$$"}, {"data": [], "text": "$$\text{$\angle LOQ = \angle LMN$,{corresponding angles are equal}. "}, {"data": [], "text": " "}, {"data": [], "text": "$$\text{$\frac{\textrm{area of }\Delta LOQ }{\textrm{area of } \Delta LMN } = \frac{LQ ^2}{LN ^2}= \frac{4 }{25 }$, as the ratio of the area of similar triangles is equal to the square of the ratio of the corresponding sides.}$$ "}]
